title: Servers not responding.
body: From last 2-3 days I cant log in.Even though if i log in.I lag very much,If i click the play button,it shows "attempting to reconnect"often and "exit instead" below.My net connection is working fine in other online games.Any help please.

replies.body: It sounds like connection is degrading over time until it's lost completely, and kicking you off the game servers.  I suggest running through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
